title: 75 RP
body: Is it possible for me to receive 75 RP? Itâ€™s just that amount I need to open another snowdown capsule, and we all know how special they are.. Thanks!

replies.body:
As my poro's in arms mentioned, I can definitely make this happen! We do need a quick sketch of something, for this I'd suggest drawing something you hope to get from that capsule!!

Shoot that sketch my way and we'll get this RP train a'truckin!
Any annie skin would be great, preferrably Hextech, but too rare according to the League of Legends gods. I have no idea how to post my drawing

The Poros require a drawn picture of their kind to gift RP.
They would greatly appreciate it in return for your capsule!

I had to post it on twitter, can't lie it took my friend and I around an hour but I have to guarantee this RP.
Here's the link: https://twitter.com/filldobros2002/status/943102840041435137

Someone drew a picture and requested 74 RP just a few days ago for their work so they could purchase a skin. You can draw anything LoL related, whether it's a specific champion, creature, etc.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
